item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "Exercise improves your sex life. Ranger to Stephanie" -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Janet Evanovich
item.description: "I had an alarm, I had nerve gas, I had a yogurt. What more could anyone want?" -- Janet Evanovich

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "A person's a person, no matter how small." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Think left and think right and think low and think high. Oh, the thinks you can think up if only you try!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "From there to here, from here to there, funny things are everywhere!" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Steve Martin
item.description: "A day without sunshine is like, you know, night." -- Steve Martin

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by A. A. Milne
item.description: "It is more fun to talk with someone who doesn't use long, difficult words but rather short, easy words like "What about lunch?" -- A. A. Milne

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "Sometimes,' said Pooh, 'the smallest things take up the most room in your heart." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by A.A. Milne
Gay-lynn add a quote by Joss Whedon
item.description: "Remember to always be yourself. Unless you suck." -- Joss Whedon

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Coco Chanel
item.description: "A girl should be two things: who and what she wants." -- Coco Chanel

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Judy Garland
item.description: "Always be a first rate version of yourself and not a second rate version of someone else." -- Judy Garland

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Oliver James
item.description: "why are trying so hard to fit in, when you're born to stand out" -- Oliver James

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by A. A. Milne
item.description: "The things that make me different are the things that make me." -- A. A. Milne

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Kurt Cobain
item.description: "Wanting to be someone else is a waste of who you are" -- Kurt Cobain

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Coco Chanel
item.description: "The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud." -- Coco Chanel

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche
item.description: "You have your way. I have my way. As for the right way, the correct way, and the only way, it does not exist." -- Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "I myself am made entirely of flaws, stitched together with good intentions." -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Jim Morrison
item.description: "Where's your will to be weird?" -- Jim Morrison

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "I don't believe in fashion. I believe in costume. Life is too short to be same person every day." -- Stephanie Perkins

item.title: Gay-lynn add a quote by Banksy
item.description: "Think outside the box, collapse the box, and take a fucking sharp knife to it." -- Banksy
